label: Level Render
description: Allow to setup a level render as the chart render

properties.name: seriesIndex
properties.label: Series Index
properties.description: The index of the series that will be rendered as a Level

properties.name: itemMargin
properties.label: Item Margin
properties.description: Specify the percentage of the item margin, must be between 0 and 1

properties.name: maximumItemWidth
properties.label: Maximum Item Width
properties.description: Sets the maximum item width, which is specified as a percentage of the available space for all items. Must be between 0 and 1
